content: frog bucket hat materials required ● yarn ○ i use loops and threads impeccable in a shade of green black white and pink ○ green about 3/4 of 1 skein black white and pink use so little i typically use scraps ● 5 mm crochet hook ● scissors ● yarn needle pattern abbreviations ● chain = chain ● single_crochet = single_crochet ● half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet ● double_crochet = double_crochet ● increase = increase insert 2 stitches into same spot ● slip_stitch = slip_stitch ● st = stitch ● blo = back loop only ● magic_ring = magic_ring ● r = round pattern notes ● the chain 2 at the beginning of each round does not count as a stitch when starting the round insert the first stitch into the same spot as the chain when ending a round do not put any stitches into the chain ● indicate repeating sections repeat instructions in for the amount of times stated example 2 double_crochet increase x4 means you do one double_crochet one double_crochet and then increase with a double_crochet and repeat this sequence 4 times ● stitch count is in brackets at the end of each round ● the slip_stitch at the end of each round is into the top of the first double_crochet of the row frog bucket hat hat smaller size this is the one i usually make starting option 1 slip knot chain 4 slip_stitch into circle starting option 2 start with magic_ring r1 chain 2 10 double_crochet into the circle option you chose slip_stitch together 10 r2 chain 2 10 increase slip_stitch together 20 r3 chain 2 double_crochet increase x10 slip_stitch together 30 r4 chain 2 2 double_crochet increase x10 slip_stitch together 40 r5 chain 2 3 double_crochet increase x10 slip_stitch together 50 r6 chain 2 4 double_crochet increase x10 slip_stitch together 60 r7-12 chain 2 60 double_crochet slip_stitch together 60 r13 chain 2 60 double_crochet in front loop only 60 r14 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch 60 r15 chain 2 double_crochet increase x10 70 r16 chain 2 double_crochet into each stitch 70 fasten_off weave in end hat larger size starting option 1 slip knot chain 4 slip_stitch into circle starting option 2 start with magic_ring r1 chain 2 10 double_crochet into the circle option you chose slip_stitch together 10 r2 chain 2 10 increase slip_stitch together 20 r3 chain 2 double_crochet increase x10 slip_stitch together 30 r4 chain 2 2 double_crochet increase x10 slip_stitch together 40 r5 chain 2 3 double_crochet increase x10 slip_stitch together 50 frog bucket hat r6 chain 2 4 double_crochet increase x10 slip_stitch together 60 r7 chain 2 5dc increase x10 slip_stitch together 70 r8-13 chain 2 70 double_crochet slip_stitch together 70 r14 chain 2 70 double_crochet in front loop only 70 r15 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch 70 r16 chain 2 double_crochet increase x10 80 r17 chain 2 double_crochet into each stitch 80 fasten_off weave in end eye fronts make 2 start with black yarn starting option 1 slip knot
